feature_model.name: Card Product
feature_model.feature_tree: :r card_product(card_product) :m Fees_and_Charges(Fees_and_Charges) :m Interest_Rates(Interest_Rates) :o Balance_Transfer_Rate(Balance_Transfer_Rate) :o Interest_Free_Days(Interest_Free_Days) :o Cash_Advance_Rate(Cash_Advance_Rate) :m Interest_Rate(Interest_Rate) :m Variable_Interest_Rate(Variable_Interest_Rate) :m Payments(Payments) :o Deferred(Deferred) :m Rewards(Rewards) :o Fly_by_Points(Fly_by_Points) :o Fuel_Savings(Fuel_Savings) :o GO_Business_Rewards(GO_Business_Rewards) :m Credit(Credit) :m Minimum_Credit_Limit(Minimum_Credit_Limit) :m Maximum_Credit_Limit(Maximum_Credit_Limit) :o Card(Card) :o Multiple_Cards(Multiple_Cards) :o Name_on_Card(Name_on_Card)
